meanings.sent1: The triunities of mind, body, and spirit are essential for overall well-being.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of triunities: a book, a bookmark, and a reading light.
meanings.sent3: The triunities of breakfast, lunch, and dinner keep me fueled throughout the day.
meanings.sent4: The triunities of past, present, and future intertwine to create the tapestry of life.
meanings.sent5: In the garden, the triunities of sun, soil, and water work together to nurture the plants.

meanings.definition: A group or set of three things.
meanings.sent1: The triunities of red, yellow, and blue are primary colors.
meanings.sent2: She received a gift set with triunities of soap, lotion, and perfume.
meanings.sent3: The triunities of breakfast, lunch, and dinner are the highlights of my day.
meanings.sent4: The triunities of rock, paper, and scissors determine the winner of the game.
meanings.sent5: The triunities of morning, afternoon, and evening structure our daily routines.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being three in one.
meanings.sent1: The triunities of father, son, and holy spirit are central to Christian belief.
meanings.sent2: The necklace symbolized the triunities of love, loyalty, and friendship.
meanings.sent3: The triunities of breakfast, lunch, and dinner make up the trifecta of meals.
meanings.sent4: The triunities of mind, body, and soul form the essence of a person.
meanings.sent5: The triunities of salt, pepper, and spices enhance the flavor of the dish.
